purpose: To provide educational AI and machine learning code examples and tutorials for learners and developers.
principle: Demonstrates AI concepts through practical coding examples using popular AI frameworks and libraries.
reusability: Code snippets and projects can be reused and adapted for educational purposes or as starting points for AI projects.
limitations: Primarily educational with varying levels of completeness; not production-ready applications.
name: ai-playground
description: Code from tutorials presented on the "Code AI with Rok" YouTube channel
highlight: Collection of AI tutorials and projects from the 'Code AI with Rok' YouTube channel, showcasing diverse AI and ML techniques.
